subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Texas Coach Augie Garrido, the N.C.A.A.’s career leader with 1,668 victories, was suspended indefinitely with pay by the university after he was arrested on suspicion of drunken driving.
snippet: Texas Coach Augie Garrido, the N.C.A.A.’s career leader with 1,668 victories, was suspended indefinitely with pay by the university after he was arrested on suspicion of drunken driving.
